values.name: Oliver Perrott Photography
values.description: Oliver Perrott is a photographer based in Brighton on the south coast of England. He specialises in shooting architecture, interiors and landscapes for private and commercial clients through out the UK. His background is based on traditional photographic teachings, using large format film cameras and wet processing. Now embracing the world of digital imaging he finds the perfect balance between the two to produce images that meet the high standards of his clients. Alongside his commercial work he continues to shoot personal projects and exhibits regularly. If you are interested in commissioning him for a project don't hesitate to get in contact.

values.name: Metranet Communications
values.description: Wireless Internet Service Provider in Brighton & Hove. Wireless network for transport management applications for Reading Borough Council's Transportation Department and Police: http://www.readingseedaproject.co.uk/

Sensatus is a Brighton based company focused on the development of financial web-apps. We are a young company that is managed by a team that has taken a previous technology company from start up through to a public listing. The development team is being expanded to address a rapid growth in customer demand for our current and planned product set.
values.name: Sensatus UK Ltd

values.description:
Plus Accounting is one of Brighton’s leading firms of Chartered Accountants. We recognise that clients now want more from their accountants than the annual accounts, they want guidance, advice and a helping hand when it is needed.

At Plus Accounting, we are fully committed to 'Beyond Accounts' with our service and the Plus+ brand reflects this.

Established for over 20 years, we are a three partner firm with a team of 20.

We deal with sole traders, partnerships and Limited Companies. Our aim is to build a long term working relationship with you so that we fully understand your business and your needs. Many of our clients see us as a trusted business partner and an integral part of their management team.

We can provide help and advise with the following:
•	Business start ups
•	Accounts preparation and audits
•	Audits of funds and grants money
•	Payroll services including BACS payments
•	Tax and VAT planning and advice
•	Business plans and cash flow projections
•	IR35 planning and support and other freelance issues
•	International trading issues
•	Research & Development tax credits and other tax claims

We offer free initial meetings and can provide fixed fee quotes.

We recognise that clients now want more from their accountants than the annual accounts; they want guidance, advice and a helping hand when it is needed - be that with the production and interpretation of management accounts or with their personal financial planning.
values.name: Plus Accounting, Chartered Accountants

values.description:
At Dehns our practical, commercially focussed approach to intellectual property helps us to turn inspired thinking into patents, trade marks and registered designs that are valuable commercial assets for our clients.

Founded in 1920, with over 70 professional staff and offices in London, Brighton, Oxford and Munich, Dehns is one of the largest firms of patent and trade mark attorneys in Europe with an internationally established reputation and a strong network of global partnerships. From large corporations to individual private inventors, our clients benefit from our expertise in a wide range of intellectual property services, including:

Preparing and filing patent, trade mark and design applications
Conducting opposition and cancellation actions
Advising on conflicting patents, trade marks and designs
Searching and watching services
Preparing and recording licences
Assignments and other transactions
Conducting certain infringement and other proceedings in the Courts
Liaising with other lawyers on both contentious and non-contentious matters
Renewing patents, trade marks and designs

As an approachable, responsive and friendly team, we give our clients closely tailored advice in all aspects of British, European and international patent, design and trade mark law.

Though the procedures of patenting and trade marking are often complex, we guide clients through the process without jargon, in a language they understand.
values.name: Dehns Patent and Trade Mark Attorneys

values.description: Crush is a truly integrated design agency providing creative solutions across all print, digital and moving media. We believe in a collaborative creative process and intelligent idea generation. We’re passionate about our work and famed for producing standout creative for clients all over the world. We don’t just want to simply make stuff look good, we want to make smart ideas look great.
values.name: Crush Creative Brighton, UK & New York, USA

values.description: Welcome to Stevinson Automotive, Colorado’s foremost auto group offering new and used Toyota, Lexus, Chevrolet, Scion, Lexus, Hyundai, Jaguar and Porsche vehicles. With 7 Denver, Colorado locations, your new Chevrolet, Toyota, Scion, Lexus, Jaguar or Porsche is just minutes away. Stevinson Automotive serves Lakewood, Golden, Arvada, Westminster, Evergreen, Littleton, Englewood, Thornton, Boulder, Northglenn, Denver, Aurora, Commerce City, Brighton, Loveland, Longmont, Superior, Fort Collins, Fort Morgan, Frederick Littleton, Centennial, Parker and as well as all of Colorado.
values.name: Stevinson Automotive

values.description:
A Michigan family business since 1954.
English Gardens operates seven retail stores, two seasonal Flower Markets and a full-service, landscaping company in Metro Detroit.  Each retail store has a nursery, garden center, florist, patio shop, and seasonal Christmas center featuring the best value and finest quality products and services. English Gardens also provides interior and exterior decorating for the holiday season.  

English Gardens is regularly named Best Garden Center in Michigan by readers of The Detroit News. Retail stores are located in Ann Arbor, Brighton, Clinton Township, Dearborn Heights, Eastpointe, Royal Oak/Troy and West Bloomfield.  Flower Markets are located in Rochester Hills & Livonia.
values.name: English Gardens

values.description:
Based in Partridge Green, West Sussex, the Dark Star Brewing Co is perhaps best known for it light, hoppy beer, Hophead, but produces over 20 different beers every year. American Pale Ale (APA) won the Golden Ale category at the Great British Beer Festival (GBBF) in 2012, with their Festival beer taking gold in the Strong Bitter category. The brewery also has two pubs: The Evening Star, Brighton and The Partridge, Partridge Green.

In 2013, the Dark Star Foundation was launched with the aim of:

1. Providing funds to pubs to assist in their fundraising efforts – a recent study from PubAid shows that pubs raise over £106,000,000 for charity each year and we want to help pubs to achieve even more.

2. We’ll provide seed funding for tomorrow’s entrepreneurs, who in-turn will be asked to ‘pay it forward’ when they have their business off the ground – assisting another enterprise.

3. We’ll issue funds to good causes / charities, based on their submissions and subsequent recommendation of the Foundation’s panel, a team of people providing the moral compass.

http://darkstarbrewing.co.uk/foundation/
values.name: Dark Star Brewing Co Ltd

values.description: Experts in residential, commercial, leasing, foreclosures, short sale real estate transactions with offices in Brighton, Ann Arbor and Holt, Michigan.  We are an independent, agent-owned company.  We are ISO 9001 certified.  Our services include property management to banks for REOs.
values.name: PreviewProperties

values.description:
NextGen Realty offers the largest selection of real estate in the Metro Boston area. Finding a home or apartment doesn't have to be stressful. At NextGen, we'll work with you to find the property of your dreams! 
 
We have over 115,000 potential apartment listings in our real time database, as well as many highly desirable sales listings throughout the greater Boston area – Allston, Brighton, Brookline, Charlestown, Cambridge, Fenway, Jamaica Plain, Medford,  Mission Hill, Newton, Somerville,  Watertown, as well as Boston's Back Bay, South End, Beacon Hill and many other popular suburban and city neighborhood's.
 
With top search engine optimization, over 90 proprietary websites, and feeds to websites all over the web, we are truly Boston's premiere full service real estate company.  Utilize the power of the largest and most advanced Boston Apartments and Boston Real Estate database to locate the next perfect place you will call home! Look for a Boston Massachusetts apartment rental through our highly helpful websites. Keep coming back frequently for all your MA real estate needs! 
 
We are hiring agents, new or experienced, to join us as part of the most successful real estate team in New England.  To learn more about our opportunities and how you can become a top producing agent, contact HR@Nextgenrealty.com!
values.name: Nextgen Realty

values.description: Tresdigital have progressed from a small club visuals company ten years ago in Brighton into a professional motion graphics company, specialising in promotional videos for marketing companies and post production effects and editing. They also have regualr commercial photography briefs in the film and entertianment industries.

With 30 years experience in retail, we pride ourselves on providing a totally unique and divine shopping experience. We offer exclusive clothing by the worlds finest designers for men and women.
values.name: Profile
Kirsten Chick
values.description:
Kirsten Chick D.N.N. (formerly Kirsten Santry) is a qualified and practising nutritional therapist, and a member of the Federation of Nutritional Therapy Practitioners. She trained with Barbara Wren at the College of Natural Nutrition.

Kirsten Chick now lectures at the College of Natural Nutrition, and also at Sussex Downs College in Lewes. Kirsten runs her nutrition practice from Brighton & Hove, and also leads regular talks, workshops and short courses around the country. Her recipe booklet “Natural Recipes” is still selling well, and she also writes for local and national publications.

Fro more information please visit:

www.connectwithnutrition.co.uk
www.naturalrecipes.co.uk
http://www.naturalrecipes.co.uk/goodfood.html
www.wholewoman.co.uk
www.visionofhopeclinic.com

Independent documentary company based in Brighton producing innovative, entertaining documentary films on social and environmental issues. Our short films have screened at film festivals around the world as well as on online portals including MiShorts and Ethical TV.

Currently working on a feature-length documentary about the history and future of nuclear power, in partnership with Dartmouth Films, producers of successful campaigning documentaries like Black Gold, The End of the Line and The Flaw.

At Tenner Films, we rely heavily on donations from supporters to make our films - crowdfunding and grassroots participation is a core part of our ethos (the company name is actually based on an ambitious target to get 10,000 people to donate £10 each to our production efforts). If you'd like to support our productions, visit http://www.tennerfilms.com and click on the Donate button - all contributions, no matter how small, are very welcome!
values.name: Tenner Films

values.description:
The English Language Bookshop (ELB Brighton) was established in 1985 and is one of the leading suppliers of ELT materials in the UK. It is staffed and run by three partners, two of whom have extensive ELT backgrounds in teaching, teacher training, course design/planning and course book writing.

We supply ELT materials to schools, colleges, universities, government agencies, Ministries of Education, training organisations, teachers, teacher trainers and individual students throughout the world.
We carry extensive stocks of materials from all the leading UK ELT publishers and can usually supply all your ELT needs ex-stock. Deliveries are made by national and international carriers and discounts are available on bulk orders.
values.name: The English Language Bookshop
Caroline Serviced Apartments
values.description: Caroline Serviced Apartments specialises in short and long term accommodation for corporate relocations and leisure travellers. Consisting of two 4.5* premium properties in South Yarra and Brighton in Melbourne, Australia - with a total of 80 apartments.
